name: Natuzzi Aura
description: The Aura chair, designed by designer Claudio Bellini, is a mix of craftsmanship and modern. The model stands out thanks to its innovative design with elegant legs, on which rests a spacious comfortable seat. Aura is a valuable piece of furniture that perfectly fits both the interior of the bedroom and the living room environment. Http://www.natuzzi.ru/ru-RU/product/aura-359c11321.html The model is made all in 3ds max. Low-poly model. Textures are all in a separate folder. In the archive there are files 3ds max 2016 and 2013 and for older versions there is a file burned. Show more
short_description:
